item.description:
Run the Reservoir 15K and 5K Run/Walk!

All proceeds from this event will benefit the Trinity Church Food Closet, which has helped many local families in need. I have never done this before but am told that it is a very scenic but somewhat challenging run. You can choose to do either the 15k, or the 5k run/walk. For this event I would think that walkers would be very welcome. I am planning to do the 5k run. I will post all information regarding the meetup the morning before the race.

If the group would like to do a brunch following the run please feel free to give me ideas along with your RSVP.

To register for the race:http://www.racesonline.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=public.race_detail&race_id=11596
item.how_to_find_us: Tim is hosting this one! Please look at his picture!!!
item.name: Run the Reservoir - 15K and 5K Run/Walk!
